description.value: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a save, it can choose to succeed instead.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is resistant to exhaustion and to the frightened condition.

Any time the tarrasque is targeted by a @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.RBoSYpr3alIlLBro]{magic missile} spell, a line spell, or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a [[/r d6]]. On a 1 to 5, the tarrasque is unaffected. On a 6, the tarrasque is unaffected, and the effect is reflected back at the caster as though it originated from the tarrasque, turning the caster into the target.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals triple damage to objects and structures.
The tarrasque uses its Frightful Presence. It then makes one Bite attack, four Claw attacks, and one Spiked Tail attack, or it makes five Acid Spit attacks.

JpJlTYpl0AV6rU6Y.name: DEX Save to Resist Being Swallowed

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save dex 27 format=long]] or be swallowed by the tarrasque. A swallowed creature is &Reference[blinded]{blinded} and &Reference[restrained]{restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effect outside of the tarrasque, and it takes [[/damage 12d6 acid average]] damage at the start of each of the tarrasque’s turns.

If the tarrasque takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the tarrasque must succeed on a [[/save con 20 format=long]] at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall &Reference[prone]{prone} in a space within 10 feet of the tarrasque. If the tarrasque dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 20 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save str 27 format=long]] save or be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}.
Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, range [[lookup @labels.range]], one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Every creature of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s choice within 120 ft. of it must succeed on a [[/save]] save or become &Reference[frightened]{frightened} of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect for itself on a success. If a creature’s save succeeds or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] automatically detects every creature and trap within 60 feet of it, pinpointing the current location of each.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] whips its spiked tail in a wide arc, flailing it in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save format=long]]. On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t knocked prone.
